subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Zinédine Zidane and Marco Materazzi were sanctioned and fined by FIFA for their part in a head-butting incident in the closing minutes of the World Cup final.
snippet: Zinédine Zidane and Marco Materazzi were sanctioned and fined by FIFA for their part in a head-butting incident in the closing minutes of the World Cup final.
